title: Come try ALL the outdoor gear at NC Get In Gear Fest
content:
Outdoor Gear Builders, a collaborative of bike and outdoor gear brands from western North Carolina, is hosting Get In Gear Fest on September 25th in Black Mountain, NC. With hundreds of acres of mountainous terrain, trails, a lake, and wide open spaces, there’s room for the whole family to try all the latest gear. Hosted […]

The post Come try ALL the outdoor gear at NC Get In Gear Fest appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
